quest.name: Rolling Bryons Gather No Moss
journal:
 Quest Sync
Euaion is fretting over a runaway creation.
objectives: Use the drying agent on the overgrown bryon, subdue it, and capture it with the lengthy aetheric rope.
Deliver the captured bryon to Euaion.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Excuse me, but have you a moment? I'm in search of a runaway creation, and need an extra set of hands to assist in its apprehension.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: I had been keeping such a close watch on the thing and it had been so well-behaved, I thought I could rest my eyes for a second. When I looked up, though─ Poof. Gone. Just like that. Please, won't you help me find it? I'll make it worth your while, I promise.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! I'll continue to search in this vicinity, though it's likely the creature scampered off farther afield. While I scour the area here, might you explore the eastern end of Rumination's Ramble?

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Oh, yes─ I should probably tell you about the creature we're looking for. We call it a bryon, a seedkin that bears a passing resemblance to a moss bloom. It will wither and perish without water...or become an overgrown monstrosity with too much! Keeping it hydrated is a delicate balancing act.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: If the creature has fallen into a river, it will be─suffice to say─too big to carry on one's own. Should you find it submerged in a body of water, try to remove as much moisture as you can. That ought to shrink it somewhat.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Use this drying agent on it to drain the sodden sop. If it begins to rave at you or act in any way rampageous, subdue it and capture it with this aetheric rope.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Let's hope that you won't have to use the drying agent, but to be perfectly frank, the creature is rather fond of water. Like as not, the bryon has thrown itself straight into a river or pond... Best be prepared for a fight.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You've spotted an overgrown creation resembling a korpokkur, and is likely the bryon you are in search of. Use the drying agent to remove some of its excess moisture.

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: The creation has begun to rave and reel!

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Nothing in my neck of the woods, I'm sorry to report. Did you have any luck?

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: You've found it! And just as I suspected, thrashing about in Rumination's Ramble. Naughty thing. So you had to subdue it, I take it? Goodness, it certainly put you through the mill. At least you do not seem too badly wounded─and nor does it.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: The bryon has the remarkable ability to predict precipitation and rainfall─if you see it shaking its leaves, you know the rain's on its way. It's why we created it in the first place, to provide those in the wetlands a method by which they might prepare for sudden storms.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, as we have discovered, it becomes absolutely enormous when exposed to liquid in large quantities, rendering them rather dangerous in humid areas. Oh well, back to the drawing board.

dialogue.name: EUAION
dialogue.text: At any rate, thank you for locating this little rascal─or rather, large rascal as the case may be. I know not whose familiar you are, but you were a tremendous help. Here, for your pains.
